perturbation.original_text: Thereafter, the Maintenance Term shall automatically renew for successive period, 12 months, on the terms and conditions of this Agreement unless Bank of America terminates Maintenance Services pursuant to this Agreement. Bank of America may terminate Maintenance Services for convenience at any time in accordance with the Section entitled "Termination" of the Agreement. If Bank of America terminates the Maintenance Services, Bank of America shall have the right to reinstate the Maintenance Services without paying any reinstatement fee.
perturbation.changed_text: Thereafter, the Maintenance Term shall automatically renew for successive period, 12 months, on the terms and conditions of this Agreement unless Bank of America terminates Maintenance Services pursuant to this Agreement. Bank of America may terminate Maintenance Services for convenience at any time in accordance with the Section entitled "Termination" of the Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of the sentence 'If Bank of America terminates the Maintenance Services, Bank of America shall have the right to reinstate the Maintenance Services without paying any reinstatement fee' omits a clause beneficial to the consumer (Bank of America). While not directly violating a specific consumer protection law, it could be argued that in certain jurisdictions, such as California, this constitutes an unfair business practice as it removes a previously offered benefit without clear justification, potentially violating the implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing. This omission creates legal risk by making the contract less favorable to the consumer and potentially open to challenge.
perturbation.contradicted_law: California Consumer Legal Remedies Act (CLRA) and implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing

perturbation.original_text: Notwithstanding anything set forth elsewhere in this Agreement (or below), the Maintenance Period shall be twenty- four (24) hours per day, seven (7) days per week, including Bank of America holidays.
perturbation.changed_text: The Maintenance Period shall be during normal business hours, excluding Bank of America holidays.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'twenty-four (24) hours per day, seven (7) days per week' creates a ambiguity about the maintenance period and contradicts the expected level of service. This creates a legal contradiction with standard business practice, which assumes services are provided during working hours, especially since no hours are specified. This change creates risk due to reduced availability during non-standard working hours, potentially violating obligations if maintenance isn't accessible 24/7 as stated.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of contract - Failure to provide maintenance 24/7.
